title: Form with Actions and useActionState (React 19)
instructions:
Create a form using React 19's form actions and useActionState.

Requirements:
1. Create a contact form with name and email fields
2. Use form action instead of onSubmit
3. Use useActionState to track pending state and result
4. Show loading state while submitting
5. Display success/error messages

React 19 introduces form actions that work with the action attribute and useActionState for managing form state.

Note: This is a React 19 feature!
